data.oai_dc:dc: CTD/LADCP-measurements at the Vema Extension Region (27°S, 34°W) in 2003-2018

CTD/LADCP-measurements data performed in 2003-2018 in the region of the Vema Extension (27°S, 34°W) by Shirshov Institute of Oceanology of the Russian Academy of Sciences. These are the results of processing raw data by standard software.
